languages.text: "Благодарю за приглашение и принимаю с радостью. Я прибуду на своем шаттле. Через некоторое время. Если позволите, я хотел бы... остаться один на некоторое время".
"I thank you for the invitation and accept it gladly. I will arrive by my shuttle. In a little while. If you'll excuse me, I would like... to be alone for the time being."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю за приглашение и принимаю с радостью. Я прибуду на своем шаттле. Через некоторое время. Если позволите, я хотел бы... остаться один на некоторое время".

traits.locale_text: "I thank you for the invitation and accept it gladly. I will arrive by my shuttle. In a little while. If you'll excuse me, I would like... to be alone for the time being."
"I thank you for the invitation and accept it gladly. I will arrive by my shuttle. In a little while. If you'll excuse me, I would like... to be alone for the time being."
"I thank you for the invitation and accept it gladly. I will arrive by my shuttle. In a little while. If you'll excuse me, I would like... to be alone for the time being."
"I thank you for the invitation and accept it gladly. I will arrive by my shuttle. In a little while. If you'll excuse me, I would like... to be alone for the time being."
"I thank you for the invitation and accept it gladly. I will arrive by my shuttle. In a little while. If you'll excuse me, I would like... to be alone for the time being."

languages.text: “谢谢您的邀请，我欣然接受。我会乘坐我的穿梭机到船上，一会儿就到。至于现在，请允许我……暂时一个人待一会儿。”
languages.original_text: "I thank you for the invitation and accept it gladly. I will arrive by my shuttle. In a little while. If you'll excuse me, I would like... to be alone for the time being."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢您的邀请，我欣然接受。我会乘坐我的穿梭机到船上，一会儿就到。至于现在，请允许我……暂时一个人待一会儿。”

languages.text: 「招待に感謝する。喜んでお受けしよう。じきに俺のシャトルで伺うよ。すまないが、それまでは…一人にさせてもらえるだろうか」
languages.original_text: "I thank you for the invitation and accept it gladly. I will arrive by my shuttle. In a little while. If you'll excuse me, I would like... to be alone for the time being."

traits.locale_text: 「招待には感謝します。そして、喜んでお受けしましょう。私のシャトルで向かいます。しかし、まずは…独りにさせてください」
「招待に感謝する。喜んでお受けしよう。じきに俺のシャトルで伺うよ。すまないが、それまでは…一人にさせてもらえるだろうか」

languages.text: "Ich danke Euch für die Einladung und nehme sie gerne an. Ich komme in meinem Shuttle. In Kürze. Entschuldigt mich jetzt, ich möchte ... jetzt gerne alleine sein."
languages.original_text: "I thank you for the invitation and accept it gladly. I will arrive by my shuttle. In a little while. If you'll excuse me, I would like... to be alone for the time being."

traits.locale_text: "Ich danke Euch für die Einladung und nehme sie gerne an. Ich komme in meinem Shuttle. In Kürze. Entschuldigt mich jetzt, ich möchte ... jetzt gerne alleine sein."

languages.text: « Je vous remercie de cette invitation et l'accepte volontiers. Je viendrai avec ma navette. D'ici peu. Si vous voulez bien m'excuser, j'aimerais... rester seul un instant. »
languages.original_text: "I thank you for the invitation and accept it gladly. I will arrive by my shuttle. In a little while. If you'll excuse me, I would like... to be alone for the time being."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous remercie de cette invitation et l'accepte volontiers. Je viendrai avec ma navette. D'ici peu. Si vous voulez bien m'excuser, j'aimerais... rester seul un instant. »

languages.text: «Le agradezco la invitación y acepto de buen grado. Llegaré en lanzadera. Dentro de un rato. Si me disculpa, me gustaría... estar a solas un rato».
languages.original_text: "I thank you for the invitation and accept it gladly. I will arrive by my shuttle. In a little while. If you'll excuse me, I would like... to be alone for the time being."

traits.locale_text: «Le agradezco la invitación y acepto de buen grado. Llegaré en lanzadera. Dentro de un rato. Si me disculpa, me gustaría... estar a solas un rato».

languages.text: "Davetinizi şükranla karşılıyor ve memnuniyetle kabul ediyorum. Kendi mekiğimle geleceğim. Lakin biraz gecikirim. İzin verirseniz şu an için yalnız kalmak istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "I thank you for the invitation and accept it gladly. I will arrive by my shuttle. In a little while. If you'll excuse me, I would like... to be alone for the time being."

traits.locale_text: "Davetinizi şükranla karşılıyor ve memnuniyetle kabul ediyorum. Kendi mekiğimle geleceğim. Lakin biraz gecikirim. İzin verirseniz şu an için yalnız kalmak istiyorum."
